definitions.definition: A person who has converted to a religion.
examples: They were all converts to Islam.

definitions.definition: A person who is now in favour of something that they previously opposed or disliked.
examples: I never really liked broccoli before, but now that I've tasted it the way you cook it, I'm a convert !

definitions.definition: Anyone who has converted from being one thing to being another.
The equivalent of a conversion in rugby

main_definition: A person who has converted to a religion.
secondary_definitions: A person who is now in favour of something that they previously opposed or disliked.
Anyone who has converted from being one thing to being another.
( Canadian football ) The equivalent of a conversion in rugby
